author: Time
title: Europe Sees More Signs of Hope as Italy’s COVID-19 Curve Falls
description: Europe is seeing further signs of hope in the coronavirus outbreak as Italy's daily death toll was at its lowest in more than two weeks.
content: ROME — Europe is seeing further signs of hope in the coronavirus outbreak as Italy’s daily death toll was at its lowest in more than two weeks and health officials noted with caution Sunday that the infection curve was finally descending. In Spain, new deaths… [+3298 chars]
